...the inequality gap in life expectancy between rich and poor countries is shrinking.
A century ago, South Koreans' life expectancy was as low as 23 years,...
...but a study of the 35 richest countries predicts a girl born in South Korea in 2030...
...is likely to live past her 90th birthday.
South Korea's annual GDP per person is more than 20 times the level in 1960...
...and these economic gains have improved the nation's health.
South Korea is predicted to leapfrog 18 other rich countries by 2030...
